data.actual_result: The bottom bar is overlapping the banned user slightly.
data.expected_result: There should be some spacing between the bottom bar and the banned user.
data.short_description: Bottom bar overlaps the last banner member SLIGHTLY in the ban list [iPhone X / XS / Max ONLY]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server of your choice. - Click on Server Settings - Hit the Ban list - Scroll down to the bottom.
